Player History
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 4/3/1985 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 5/20/1985, off Bryn Smith (MON)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/5/1985, off Eric Show (SD)...
2/2/1986: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Was selected to the 1986 Allstar game...
2/2/1987: Gets a new one-year contract worth $350,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 4/14/1987 with a Broken Ulna, out for 5 weeks...
9/1/1987: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $1,100,000 per year, for 2 years.
Was claimed off waivers by Atlanta on 6/7/1988.
5/19/1989: Signed a contract extension with Atlanta, $400,000 per year, for 2 years.
